head.title: Mabton School District: COVID-19 (CORONAVIRUS) Information & Updates

meta.name: description
meta.content: Mabton is located in the fertile Yakima Valley approximately 43 miles southeast of Yakima, Washington, and 45 miles west of the Tri-Cities. It is in the heart of the state’s hops, and grape-growing region.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Mabton School District, Mabton SD, Superintendent Joseph, Joey, Castilleja, Mabton WA.

span.strong: Services during School Closure -- Servicios de cierre de escuelas
INFORMATION REGARDING OUR MOVE TO ONLINE SCHOOL ON APRIL 27, 2020:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: MSD going to Online Google Classroom Starting the 27th of this month . . . 4th grade to 12th grade.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: Prek - 3 will also be online but students will get packets in mail initially.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: We need an email for each parent for parent contact.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Please contact your internet or cellular provider; many are providing free or enhanced service for internet access if you have some access already.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: All students 4th through 12th grade will be receiving a mobile device to access the online google classroom.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: The first day of Required Online school through google classroom is the 27th.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: No decisions have been made with what to do about graduation.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: We are collecting data on what our best options are

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: WE WILL HAVE A GRADUATION of some sort, and it will be super awesome and special!

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: We are working to get school supply packs to all students

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Look for further communication.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: We anticipate distributing the same way we do school meals.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Many teachers are calling to get in contact with students.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: If you receive a call from a 440 number, it is most likely a teacher.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Please feel free to contact teachers at their posted numbers or emails - MSD120.org - updates soon.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Link to

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Currently we cannot open the buildings for students and community.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: For personal belonging that are connected to ‘essential needs’ please contact the district office

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: For all other personal items please stay tuned, we will share the method to getting personal items as soon as we can open buildings to the students, parents and community.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Please have your students check their email daily if not more frequently.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Call your school if you need assistance with your email login information. Any office, principal, or teacher should be able to help you.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: We are currently awaiting guidance from our state on how grading will work.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: We are anticipating that the state will offer us a lot of

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: about how we grade.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: We plan to take

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: the most beneficial route we can for Mabton students

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: when it comes to how we post grades.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: to Log into class, engage with your teacher and learn, and work hard. This will ensure you can retain your credits and benefit from the local grading decisions made by our administration and school board.

div.br:
Who: ANYONE 18 years and under
What: FREE grab n’ go meals (Breakfast and Lunch)
How: Look for a Mabton School District Bus!
When: March 23-April 24, 10:30am-12:00pm
Where: Artz Fox Elementary parking lot; Park Bus Stop; Outside of city limits at normal pick-up/drop-off bus locations.

li.style: list-style-type: none
list-style-type: none
list-style-type: none

ul.li: Children must be present to receive a meal
Locations and times subject to change
Meals are free and no ID is required

span.strong: CHILD CARE WILL BEGIN MONDAY MARCH 23 FOR
FIRST RESPONDERS AND HEALTH CARE PROVIDERS

strong.span: Mabton School District also providing limited childcare for school age children. This childcare is only for health care providers or first responders and is a last resort. Children with high-risk factors for COVID-19 should also consider other means of childcare to support social distancing. If you are a first responder or health care provider and have children in the Mabton School District, please email a copy of your work credentials to RespondersChildCare@msd120.org to advise us of your need for care. More information will be sent to you at that time.

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: Quién: CUALQUIERA de 18 años y menos

br.span: Cómo: ¡Busque un autobús del distrito escolar de Mabton!
Cuándo: 23 de marzo al 24 de abril, 10:30am-12:00pm
Dónde: Artz Fox Elementary estacionamiento, Park Bus Stop, Fuera de los límites de la ciudad en las ubicaciones normales de recogida/entrega de autobuses.

li.style: list-style-type: none
list-style-type: none
list-style-type: none

span.span: Los niños deben estar presentes para recibir una comida
Ubicaciones y horarios sujetos a cambios
Las comidas son gratuitas y no se requiere identificación

strong.span: EL CUIDADO DE LOS NINOS COMIENZA EL LUNES 23 DE MARZO PARA LOS PRIMEROS RESPONDEDORES Y PROVEEDORES DE CUIDADO DE SALUD

span.span: El Distrito Escolar de Mabton también brinda cuidado de niños limitado para niños en edad escolar. Esta guardería es solo para

span.style: color: #2a2b2c; font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif; text-align: left

span.span: los prestadores de servicios de emergencia y empleados del campo de salud. Si usted presta servicios de emergencia o es proveedor de servicios de salud y tiene hijos(as) en el distrito escolar de Mabton, por favor envíe una copia de sus credenciales profesionales a

a.style: color: #005ab9; font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif; text-align: left

span.style: color: #2a2b2c; font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif; text-align: left

span.span: para avisarnos de su necesidad de servicio. Le enviaremos más información en ese momento.
Los niños con factores de alto riesgo con el coronavirus (COVID-19) también deben considerar otros medios de cuidado infantil para apoyar el distanciamiento social.

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: Due to the Coronavirus our Governor, Jay Inslee, has issued a state-wide school closure. School will be closed from MONDAY March 16 through April 26. Classes are scheduled to resume April 27.

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
span.br: As things change more information is coming. Please continue to monitor our website at www.MSD120.org, or our Facebook page.

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
color: #222222; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

span.span: Debido al Coronavirus, nuestro Gobernador, Jay Inslee, ha emitido un cierre escolar en todo el estado. La escuela estará cerrada del 16 de marzo al 26 de abril. Las clases están programadas para reanudarse el 27 de abril.

br.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
color: #222222; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

span.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

br.span: Las cosas están cambiando rápidamente y viene más información.

br.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

span.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

br.span: Continúe monitoreando el sitio web de nuestra escuela en www.MSD120.org

span.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; line-height: 10.5pt; background-color: white; padding: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: Mabton School District wants to share its preparedness, prevention and information plans with students, staff, and families regarding 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19).

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: The Washington State Department of Health confirms that there is no evidence that COVID-19 is spreading in Washington at this time, and the immediate risk to the general public in Washington and the United States is considered to be low.

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: The Department of Health advises school districts to take the same preventative measures it normally would to prevent the spread of viruses during the regular cold and flu season. Common preventative measures recommended for students and staff include:

li.span: Stay home when you are sick and/or running a fever.

Wash your hands frequently with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the bathroom, before eating, and after you blow your nose. If hands are visibly dirty, use soap and water to clean hands.
If soap and water are not readily available, use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol.
Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands.
Cover coughs or sneezes with a tissue, then throw the tissue in the trash and clean hands with soap and water or hand sanitizer (if soap and water are not readily available).
Get a flu shot during the flu season.

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: The District’s custodial and maintenance programs will continue to emphasize and implement best practices in cleaning, disinfecting, and sanitizing our schools.

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: District officials are in regular contact with Yakima County Health District officials and have reviewed emergency response plans should COVID-19 arise locally. If this were to occur, the district’s emergency response plan will follow the direction and guidance of local and state health officials and will immediately be communicated with parents and the greater community.

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: More information about COVID-19 can be accessed at the links below, or by calling the Washington State Department of Health at 1-800-525-0127, or our local Yakima County Health District at 509-575-4040.

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial

a.span: U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: El Distrito Escolar de Mabton quiere compartir sus planes de preparación, prevención e información con los estudiantes, el personal y las familias con respecto al Novel Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: El Departamento de Salud del Estado de Washington confirma que no hay evidencia de que COVID-19 se esté propagando en Washington en este momento, y el riesgo inmediato para el público en general en Washington y los Estados Unidos se considera bajo.

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: El Departamento de Salud aconseja a los distritos escolares que tomen las mismas medidas preventivas que normalmente tomarían para prevenir la propagación de virus durante la temporada regular de resfriados y gripe. Las medidas preventivas comunes recomendadas para estudiantes y personal incluyen:

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial

li.style: color: #1e1e1f; line-height: normal; tab-stops: list .5in; background: white
li.span: Permanezca en casa cuando esté enfermo o tenga fiebre.

li.style: color: #1e1e1f; line-height: normal; tab-stops: list .5in; background: white
li.span: Lávese las manos con frecuencia con agua y jabón por al menos 20 segundos, especialmente después de ir al baño, antes de comer y después de sonarse la nariz.

li.style: color: #1e1e1f; line-height: normal; tab-stops: list .5in; background: white
li.span: Si las manos están visiblemente sucias, use agua y jabón para limpiar sus manos.

li.style: color: #1e1e1f; line-height: normal; tab-stops: list .5in; background: white
li.span: Si no hay agua y jabón disponibles, use un desinfectante para manos con base de alcohol con al menos 60% de alcohol.

li.style: color: #1e1e1f; line-height: normal; tab-stops: list .5in; background: white
li.span: Evite tocarse los ojos, la nariz y la boca con las manos sin lavar

li.style: color: #1e1e1f; line-height: normal; tab-stops: list .5in; background: white
li.span: Cubra la tos o los estornudos con un pañuelo desechable, luego tírelo a la basura y lávese las manos con agua y jabón o desinfectante para manos (si no hay agua y jabón disponibles).

li.style: color: #1e1e1f; line-height: normal; tab-stops: list .5in; background: white
li.span: Vacúnese contra la gripe durante la temporada de gripe.

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: Los programas de mantenimiento y aseo del Distrito continuarán enfatizando e implementando las mejores prácticas para limpiar, desinfectar y esterilizar nuestras escuelas.

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: Los funcionarios del distrito están en contacto regular con los funcionarios de Distrito de Salud del Condado de Yakima y han revisado los planes de respuesta ante emergencias en caso de que surja COVID-19 localmente. Si esto ocurriera, el plan de respuesta de emergencia del distrito seguirá las instrucciones y la orientación de los funcionarios de salud locales y estatales y se comunicará de inmediato con los padres y la comunidad en general.

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
p.span: Se puede acceder a más información sobre el COVID-19 en los siguientes enlaces, o llamando al Departamento de Salud del Estado de Washington al 1-800-525-0127, o nuestro Distrito de Salud de Yakima local al 509-575-4040.

p.style: line-height: normal; background-color: white; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial
